::Zardus::

Zardus nods. Magmatron sounded like a wise leader. "Hmm.. So you have 
no idea on what this new technology might be?"

He recieves Wheeljack's report. Setting his comm-link to silent 
(Cerebrus wouldn't hear him reply), he replies. "Excellent. Can you 
make them transmit in a columb, meeting with the edges of the Iron 
Fist's shields above water, and with the sea bottom on the bottom?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Cerberus::
> 
>     This was his chance to make Magmatron look bad. "He is 
developing new technology, I don't have access to it, I am not 'high 
enough in command' as he put it, although I am second in command."
